subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dante Cunningham scored 14 points and Scottie Reynolds made four free throws in the final 1 minute 7 seconds Saturday to help No. 20 Villanova hold off cold-shooting South Florida, 70-61, in Tampa, Fla.
snippet: Dante Cunningham scored 14 points and Scottie Reynolds made four free throws in the final 1 minute 7 seconds Saturday to help No. 20 Villanova hold off cold-shooting South Florida, 70-61, in Tampa, Fla.
